## Filters.FilterGroupProvider() function

The Filters.FilterGroupProvider component represents a group of filters to support for searching and collapsing.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function FilterGroupProvider(props: FilterGroupProviderProps): JSX.Element;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  props | FilterGroupProviderProps | [Filters.FilterGroupProviderProps](./answers-react-components.filters.filtergroupproviderprops.md) |

<b>Returns:</b>

JSX.Element

## Remarks

A Filter.Group designates a set of filters which may be collapsed through the [Filters.CollapsibleLabel()](./answers-react-components.filters.collapsiblelabel.md) and [Filters.CollapsibleSection()](./answers-react-components.filters.collapsiblesection.md) components. A Filter.Group also designates a set of filters which may be searched with the [Filters.SearchInput()](./answers-react-components.filters.searchinput.md) component.
